messages.content:
display a random set of 61 characters from the set a-z, A-Z, 0-9, '-' and '.' The characters should be displayed on 9 lines, perfectly centered using CSS styling, with 5 characters on the first line, 6 characters on the second line, 7 characters on the third line, 8 characters on the fourth line, 9 characters on the fifth line, 8 characters on the sixth line, 7 characters on the seventh line, 6 characters on the eighth line, 5 characters
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

please add three spaces between each character
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
